Heading Usage

H1 - h3 can be used in $darkest-gray and .white only and all caps only. They all use Open Sans $heading, uppercase .uppercase;, and font-weight of 200.

H1. An Example of a large heading

font-size: 3em; For use in hero/banner areas only.

H2. An Example of a lead heading

font-size: 2em; For use as section, page or river headings.

H3. An Example of an element heading

font-size: 1.5em; For use as title or headings of elements. i.e. OfferBox, Value Props, Grid module elements, any grid style graphic element.

H4-h6 can be used in all caps only. They use Montserrat $subhead, uppercase .uppercase;, and a font-weight of 600 .semi-bold.

h4. An Example of a sub-heading

font-size: 1.75em; For use as a sub-heading above or beneath an h1 or h2. Only to be used in $rackspace-red, $darkest-gray or .white.

h5. An Example of a Text Title

font-size: 1.25em; For use as a title or heading within a text section. Can be used in $rackspace-red or $darkest-gray.

h6. An Example of a Small Accent Text Title

Examples of Font Usage in Multiple Languages

English

H2. An Example of a lead heading. Question?

h4. An Example of a sub-heading. Question?

Example of Copy Body Text. Exclamation!

h4 . Un ejemplo de un subtítulo . ¿Pregunta?

Portugese

h4 . Um exemplo de uma sub -rubrica . Questão?

Exemplo de texto cópia do corpo . Exclamação!

Chinese

H2 。大標題示例。題？

H4 。子標題的一個實例。題？
